dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 21 IH: Disapproving of the rule submitted by the Department of Homeland Security relating to “Modernizing H–2 Program Requirements, Oversight, and Worker Protections”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Arrington (for himself, Mr. Self, and Mr. Moore of West Virginia) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: Disapproving of the rule submitted by the Department of Homeland Security relating to Modernizing H–2 Program Requirements, Oversight, and Worker Protections.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Homeland Security relating to Modernizing H–2 Program Requirements, Oversight, and Worker Protections (89 Fed. Reg. 103202), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
